author: ralexstokes
content: there is a middle ground where a client generates everything it can and then the validator user can say "don't broadcast anything in this time frame, bc i'm not sure"

author: ralexstokes
content: which will likely be better than getting slashed

author: ralexstokes
content: i've been tossing around the idea of a third-party service of "validator operation" backups as a kind of insurance for this

author: ralexstokes
content: there is a tricky design question when you get to this stuff which is the trade-off b/t protecting a validator's stake and the effective moral hazard generated via insurance
